title: A Bold Deal
description: The only escape is one she doesnâ€™t want to take.Unable to pay her bills, Hillary Morgan is forced to take desperate measures. Her father unexpectedly passed away, leaving a mountain of bills. A surprise call rocks her world, informing her that her mother will have to battle cancer while she grieves. Devastated by the loss of her father, she can't imagine losing her mother, too. Lucky for Hillary, her best friend knows of a way for her to earn a lot of money, but the risk his huge.Eric Reid grew up poor, knowing what true hunger was. But hard work made him money, and he's out to get revenge on the one man who tried to ruin him, James Morgan. Eric sees an opportunity to repay Morgan in kind, but it will mean using his daughter. Eric never meant to fall for Hillary, but his heart doesn't care about his plans.Hillary and Eric come together with explosive results. Can they survive the aftermath?
author: Julia Bright
